Self.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by the creator. The word 'self'.

Guild.description: A ressource with this permissions can only be seen by members of the guild. The word 'guild'.

Global.description: A ressource with this permissions can be seen by everyone. The word 'global'.

None.description: No action is performed. The word 'none'.

ContentDeleted.description: The message is deleted. The word 'content deleted'.

CaseCreated.description: A case is created. The word 'case created'.

ContentDeletedAndCaseCreated.description: The message is deleted and a case is created. The word 'content deleted and case created'.

InvitePosted.description: A message with an invite link is posted. The word 'invite posted'.

TooManyEmotes.description: A message with too many emotes is posted. The word 'too many emotes'.
TooManyEmotes.at: Zu vü Emojis san vawendt woan

TooManyMentions.description: A message with too many mentions is posted. The word 'too many mentions'.
TooManyMentions.at: Zu vü Nutza san erwähnt woan

TooManyAttachments.description: A message with too many attachments is posted. The word 'too many attachments'.
TooManyAttachments.at: Zu vü Ohäng san verwendt woan

TooManyEmbeds.description: A message with too many embeds is posted. The word 'too many embeds'.
TooManyEmbeds.at: Zu vü Eibettungen san vawendt woan

TooManyAutoModerations.description: A user triggered too many automoderations. The word 'too many auto-moderations'.

CustomWordFilter.description: A message with a custom word is posted. The word 'custom word'.

TooManyMessages.description: A user posted too many messages. The word 'too many messages'.

InvalidDiscordUser.description: The user is not a valid discord user.

ProtectedModCaseSuspect.description: This user is protected. Modcases cannot be created.

ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsBot.description: This user is protected. Modcases cannot be created.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsBot.en: User is protected. He is a bot.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsBot.de: Benutzer ist geschützt. Er ist ein Bot.

ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsSiteAdmin.description: This user is protected. Modcases cannot be created.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsSiteAdmin.en: User is protected. He is a site admin.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsSiteAdmin.de: Benutzer ist geschützt. Er ist ein Seitenadministrator.

ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsTeam.description: This user is protected. Modcases cannot be created.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsTeam.en: User is protected. He is a team member.
ProtectedModCaseSuspectIsTeam.de: Benutzer ist geschützt. Er ist ein Teammitglied.

ResourceNotFound.description: The resource could not be found.

GuildUndefinedMutedRoles.description: The guild is not defined muted roles.
GuildUndefinedMutedRoles.en: Guild has no roles for mute punishment defined.
GuildUndefinedMutedRoles.de: Gilde hat keine Rollen für Stummschaltungen definiert.

ModCaseIsMarkedToBeDeleted.description: The modcase is marked to be deleted.
ModCaseIsMarkedToBeDeleted.en: Modcase is marked to be deleted

ModCaseIsNotMarkedToBeDeleted.description: The modcase is not marked to be deleted.
ModCaseIsNotMarkedToBeDeleted.en: Modcase is not marked to be deleted
ModCaseIsNotMarkedToBeDeleted.de: Modcase ist nicht zum Löschen markiert

NotAllowedInDemoMode.description: This action is not allowed in demo mode.
NotAllowedInDemoMode.en: This action is not allowed in demo mode
NotAllowedInDemoMode.de: Diese Aktion ist in der Demo-Version nicht erlaubt

RoleNotFound.description: The role could not be found.

TokenCannotManageThisResource.description: The token cannot manage this resource.
TokenCannotManageThisResource.de: Tokens können diese Ressource nicht verwalten

CannotBeSameUser.description: The user cannot be the same user.

ModCaseDoesNotAllowComments.description: The modcase does not allow comments.
ModCaseDoesNotAllowComments.en: Comments are locked for this modcase
ModCaseDoesNotAllowComments.de: Kommentare sind für diesen Vorfall gesperrt

LastCommentAlreadyFromSuspect.description: The last comment was already from the suspect.
LastCommentAlreadyFromSuspect.en: The last comment was already from the suspect.
LastCommentAlreadyFromSuspect.de: Der letzte Kommentar war schon von dem Beschuldigten.

InvalidAutomoderationAction.description: The automoderation action is not valid.

InvalidAutomoderationType.description: The automoderation type is not valid.

TooManyTemplates.description: The user has reached the max limit of templates.
TooManyTemplates.en: User has reached the max limit of templates
TooManyTemplates.de: Benutzer hat die maximale Anzahl an Templates erreicht

InvalidFilePath.description: The file path is not valid.

OnlyUsableInAGuild.description: This action is only usable in a guild.
OnlyUsableInAGuild.en: This action is only usable in a guild
OnlyUsableInAGuild.de: Diese Aktion ist nur in einer Gilde nutzbar
